TypeSignature.Value: public class FieldTemplateUserControl : System.Web.UI.UserControl, System.Web.DynamicData.IFieldTemplate, System.Web.UI.IBindableControl
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FieldTemplateUserControl extends System.Web.UI.UserControl implements class System.Web.DynamicData.IFieldTemplate, class System.Web.UI.IBindableControl
Public Class FieldTemplateUserControl Inherits UserControl Implements IBindableControl, IFieldTemplate
public ref class FieldTemplateUserControl : System::Web::UI::UserControl, System::Web::DynamicData::IFieldTemplate, System::Web::UI::IBindableControl

summary.span: 代表所有欄位樣板控制項的基底類別。

span.span: Represents the base class for all field template controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 動態資料欄位的範本會對應至資料模型中的資料類型的資料控制項的 ASP.NET 使用者控制項。ASP.NET Dynamic Data field templates are ASP.NET user controls that map data controls to data types in a data model. 欄位範本衍生自，可讓您存取資料欄位、 資料行，以及在資料模型中的中繼資料的類別。Field templates derive from , the class that enables access to data fields, data columns, and metadata in data models. 動態資料專案預設會提供欄位的範本。Dynamic Data projects provide field templates by default. 您可以修改預設提供的欄位樣板，或建立自訂欄位的範本。You can modify the field templates provided by default or create custom field templates. 此類別繼承自類別。This class inherits from the Class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立會顯示具有多對一關聯性和呈現資料欄位的欄位樣板將使用者重新導向至 [關聯性] 頁面的控制項。The following code example creates a field template that displays data fields that have a many-to-one relationship and renders a control that redirects the user to the relationship page. 下列範例顯示 ForeignKey.ascx 使用者控制項的程式碼檔案。The following example shows the code file for the ForeignKey.ascx user control. ```vb Public Partial Class ForeignKeyField Inherits System.Web.DynamicData.FieldTemplateUserControl Protected Function GetDisplayString() As String Return FormatFieldValue( _ ForeignKeyColumn.ParentTable.GetDisplayString(FieldValue)) End Function Public Overloads Overrides ReadOnly Property DataControl() As Control Get Return HyperLink1 End Get End Property End Class ``` ```csharp public partial class ForeignKeyField : System.Web.DynamicData.FieldTemplateUserControl { protected string GetDisplayString() { Return FormatFieldValue(ForeignKeyColumn.ParentTable.GetDisplayString(FieldValue)); public override Control DataControl { get { return HyperLink1; } } ``` 下列範例會示範 ForeignKey.aspx 檔案。The following example shows the ForeignKey.aspx file. ```vb <%@ Control Language="VB" CodeFile="ForeignKey.ascx.vb" Inherits="ForeignKeyField" %> ``` ```csharp <%@ Control Language="C#" CodeFile="ForeignKey.ascx.cs" Inherits="ForeignKeyField" %> ``` 若要編譯範例程式碼，您需要下列項目：To compile the example code, you need the following: - [!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[vwd_exp_dev10_long](~/includes/vwd-exp-dev10-long-md.md)]。 or [!INCLUDE[vwd_exp_dev10_long](~/includes/vwd-exp-dev10-long-md.md)]. - Dynamic Data 網站。A Dynamic Data Web site. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說： 建立新動態資料網站上使用 Scaffolding](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1564aef2-9103-436a-9806-c8ad7abd616a)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Creating a New Dynamic Data Web Site Using Scaffolding](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1564aef2-9103-436a-9806-c8ad7abd616a).

summary.span: 取得 URL (用來連結到子實體清單的顯示頁面)，並允許覆寫路徑。

span.span: Gets the URL that links to the page that displays the list of children entities and allows the path to be overridden.

returns.span: URL，用來連結顯示的頁面和子頁面。

span.span: The URL that links the displayed page to the children page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是類似於，不同之處在於它可讓覆寫 URL 的路徑部分。This method is similar to , except that it allows the path part of the URL to be overridden. 如果頁面不位於 DynamicData\CustomPages 資料夾的動態資料專案中，會使用這個方法。This method is used if the pages are not located in the DynamicData\CustomPages folder of the Dynamic Data project. 這個方法適用於只子資料行。This method applies to Children columns only.

span.span: Get the URL that links the current page to the page that displays the details of the foreign key entity and allows the path to be overridden.

returns.span: URL，用來連結到外部索引鍵頁面詳細資料的顯示頁面。

span.span: The URL that links to the page that displays the details of the foreign key page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是類似於不同之處在於它可讓覆寫的 url 路徑。This method is similar to except that it allows the path of the URL to be overridden. 此屬性使用的頁面不位於您 DynamicData\CustomPages 資料夾中的動態資料的專案。This property is used if the page is not located in the DynamicData\CustomPages folder your the Dynamic Data project.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回顯示一份子實體的頁面連結 URL。This method returns a URL that links to a page that displays a list of children entities. 例如，產品資料行 ProductCategories 資料表中有提供 AdventureWorksLT 範例資料庫中的連結至產品的清單中選取之類別目錄的 Url。For example, the products column in the ProductCategories table in the AdventureWorksLT sample database has URLs that link to the list of product that are in the selected category. 這個屬性只適用於子資料行。This property only applies to children columns.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property ForeignKeyPath As String
protected: property System::String ^ ForeignKeyPath { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 URL，用來連結目前頁面和外部索引鍵實體詳細資料的顯示頁面。

value.span: URL，用來連結到外部索引鍵資料的詳細資料。

span.span: The URL that links to the details of the foreign key data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果資料行具有多對一關聯性，這個屬性傳回的 URL 連結顯示的外部索引鍵的實體詳細資料頁面。If the data column has a many-to-one relationship, this property returns a URL that links to the page that displays the details of the foreign key entity. 比方說，在 Northwind 資料庫中的 Product 資料表的類別資料行，這個方法可以傳回產品都屬於類別目錄的詳細資訊的連結。For example, in the Category column of the Product table in the Northwind Database, this method can return a link that goes to the details of the category that the product belongs to. 這個屬性適用於僅外部索引鍵資料行。This property applies to foreign key columns only.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void IgnoreModelValidationAttribute(class System.Type attributeType) cil managed

span.span: The attribute to ignore.

summary.span: 允許 忽略模型驗證屬性的特定型別。

span.span: Allows a to ignore a specific type of model validation attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可讓忽略特定類型的模型驗證屬性。This method allows a to ignore a specific type of model Validation attributes. 會呼叫這個方法，當屬性類型已經由 ASP.NET 驗證控制項。This method is called when the attribute type is already handled by an ASP.NET validation controls. 沒有這個呼叫，會發生驗證兩次，導致重複的錯誤訊息。Without this call, the validation can occur two times, resulting in a duplicate error message.
